author: you might have a very

author: Carl Jung

quote: Sorrow happens

quote: I stand before you a totally healthy person.

quote: I had my moments when I got very frightened that I would not recover.

quote: We exaggerate misfortune and happiness alike. We are never as bad off or as happy as we say we are.

quote: The average
author: healthy

quote: Healthy people live with their world.

quote: Happiness is perfume

quote: Know then this truth
author: enough for man to know virtue alone is happiness below.

quote: You know

quote: When you relinquish the desire to control your future

quote: Money
author: if it does not bring you happiness

quote: The happiness of the bee and the dolphin is to exist. For man it is to know that and to wonder at it.

quote: Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.

quote: Grief knits two hearts in closer bonds than happiness ever can; and common sufferings are far stronger links than common joys.

quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want

category: and do what you'd rather not.

quote: If you ever find happiness by hunting for it
author: you will find it
category: as the old woman did her lost spectacles

quote: Happiness: a good bank account

quote: Objects we ardently pursue bring little happiness when gained; most of our pleasures come from unexpected sources.

quote: As a child is indulged or checked in its early follies

quote: A #2 pencil and a dream can take you anywhere.

author: properly speaking

author: we're marketing hope.

author: hope

quote: I hope there are some audiophiles still out there.

quote: It's just a part of our nature to hope.

author: influence people.

quote: I really hope my peers appreciate and respect what I'm doing.

quote: Who dares nothing
author: need hope for nothing.

quote: A person
author: who no matter how desperate the situation

quote: The Middle East is hopeful. There's hope there.

quote: We should not moor a ship with one anchor

quote: They have a kind of Bob Hope and Bing Crosby thing going on.

quote: I think they'd rather us follow our hearts and I hope that's what some people will understand.

quote: I
author: for one
category: hope that youth will again revolt and again demoralize the dead weight of conformity that now lies upon us.

quote: Together we can make a world where cancer no longer means living with fear
author: without hope

quote: The results of political changes are hardly ever those which their friends hope or their foes fear.

quote: Hope is a great falsifier. Let good judgment keep her in check.

quote: Life has changed enormously

quote: I hope I left behind a legacy that people will enjoy. But whatever they want to say

quote: In an election
author: one needs both hope and audacity.

quote: And as far as false hope
author: there is no such thing. There is only hope or the absence of hope-nothing else.

quote: The very least you can do in your life is to figure out what you hope for. And the most you can do is live inside that hope.

quote: One must always hope when one is desperate

quote: I hope my tongue in prune juice smothers
author: If I belittle dogs and mothers.

quote: I hope my own children never have to fight a war.

quote: I hope to work harder than ever to help people around the world.

quote: I would hope they would be our fellow artists
author: rather than trying to emulate or idolize clowns like us.

quote: Beware how you take away hope from any human being.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: I don't consider myself to be a major talent
author: so the only solace I can take is to hope I'm growing.

quote: I love being able to sing for my job. I am blessed beyond words and I hope my fans can feel that while I'm on stage!

quote: Fear is a very explosive emotion

author: as an actor
category: to reveal only what is relevant about myself to the work.

quote: I hope I live long enough to see every hungry school child in the world being fed under the so-called McGovern-Dole program.

quote: I don't know how many good books I still have in me; I hope there are another four or five.

quote: Among physicists
author: I'm respected I hope.

author: I suppose - although quite a spiritual atheist

quote: I hope to make movies that are so small they don't need to make anything to be profitable.

quote: There is nothing so well known as that we should not expect something for nothing - but we all do and call it Hope.

quote: Nothing that is worth doing can be achieved in a lifetime; therefore we must be saved by hope.

quote: Acting provides the fulfillment of never being fulfilled. You're never as good as you'd like to be. So there's always something to hope for.

author: a healthy
